div.p: OF THE DAY, MY UPCOMING BOOK CALLED KILLING PATTON.
IT WILL BE RELEASED THE 23rd. IT EXAMINES THE LAST FEW MONTHS
OF WORLD WAR II IN EUROPE AND THE STRANGE DEATH OF GENERAL
IF YOU THINK YOU KNOW WHAT HAPPENED TO PATTON, ROOSEVELT,
HITLER, YOU DO NOT. I KNOW THAT SOUNDS BOLD AND
FRESH BUT I THINK WE BACK IT UP. IF YOU BECOME A BILLOREILLY.COM
PREMIUM MEMBER YOU GET THE BOOK FREE AND GET IT FIRST IF YOU
ORDER IN ADVANCE. YOU’LL LIKE THIS BOOK, I CAN
ALMOST GUARANTEE IT. O’REILLY, YOU’RE EXACTLY RIGHT
ON CRIMINOLOGY AND KRIR STON POWERS IS WRONG AND CONTINUES TO
